import { useState } from 'react' import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' const initialState = { name: '', email: '', message: '', } export const Contact = (props) => { const [{ user_name, user_email, message }, setState] = useState(initialState) const handleChange = (e) => { const { user_name, value } = e.target setState((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [user_name]: value })) } const clearState = () => setState({ ...initialState }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() emailjs .sendForm( 'essgmail', 'template_g86grqj', e.target, 'qgWIwkNalDiLxrVfi' ) .then( (result) => { alert('Your message is sent!') clearState() }, (error) => { console.log(error.text) } ) } return (

Contact me

In the case you want to tell me something. Leave it here... Then I will send us an email as soon as possible.

Contact Info

Address {props.data ? props.data.address : 'loading'}

Phone {' '} {props.data ? props.data.phone : 'loading'}

Email {' '} {props.data ? props.data.email : 'loading'}

) }
